description:
As the Straw Hats and company flee the crumbling laboratory, Caesar`s desperate act of vengeance thwarts Joker`s plan to forever silence his enemies!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Critical Situation! Punk Hazard Explodes!
Course effrénée vers la lumière. Grande explosion sur Punk Hazard !
Отчаянное Положение! Большой Взрыв Панк Хазарда
絶体絶命! パンクハザード大爆発
